thread.title: Live: OPS on fast for probe into Jaya's death
thread.title_full: Live: OPS on fast for probe into Jaya's death

title: Live: OPS on fast for probe into Jaya's death
text:
2017-03-08 | 12:10 PM (IST) Fast by Panneerselvam group seeking probe into Jayalalithaa death Rebel AIADMK leader O Panneerselvam's faction is observing one-day fast today in all district capitals across Tamil Nadu, seeking an independent probe into the demise of former chief minister J Jayalalithaa. Key Highlights Ooops.. At least one check box should be ticked. FILTER UPDATES Text and Social Videos 12:10 PM (IST) Vellore MP B Senguttuvan told media persons that he will raise issue pertaining to death of party leader Jayalalithaa and demand CBI inquiry in the forthcoming Parliament session. 11:50 AM (IST) More than 10,000 people in Salem district fast 11:29 AM (IST) OPS supporters protest in Coimbatore 11:28 AM (IST) OPS supporters protest in Coimbatore 11:24 AM (IST) Jayalalithaa's speech in 2006 has gone viral at OPS fast venue. In the speech, she had praised OPS as a person loyal to her and the party. 11:21 AM (IST) OPS supporters in Erode district. 10:58 AM (IST) Panneerselvam and supporters stage a hunger strike at Chennai's Rajarathinam Stadium, demanding CBI probe into Jayalalithaa's death pic.twitter.com/Mis6yEwCmt — ANI (@ANI_news) March 8, 2017 10:55 AM (IST) OPS group protest at Dharmapuri 10:54 AM (IST) The transfer of district collector, Kancheepuram (under whose jurisdiction Koovathur falls) was a planned move Maitreyan 10:54 AM (IST) AIADMK MP V Maitreyan demands that the case filed by Koovathur police against CM Edappadi K Palaniswami and VK Sasikala on the charges of "illegal detention of MLAs," be shifted to CBI 10:45 AM (IST) Around 2500 AIADMK cadres participating in hunger protest in Tiruvannamalai. Former minister Ramachandran and MP Vanaroja leading the protest 10:32 AM (IST) OPS will reveal more truth about Sasikala at the end of the fast at 5pm, says a former MLA JCD Prabhakar 10:30 AM (IST) OPS supporters are taking part in the hunger protest in Salem district demanding CBI inquiry into the death of former CM Jayalalithaa. 10:27 AM (IST) Vellore MP B Senguttuvan (second from right) at the protesting venue 10:26 AM (IST) OPS supporters are taking part in the hunger protest in Vellore demanding CBI inquiry into the death of former CM Jayalalithaa 10:06 AM (IST) Former AIADMK minister T P Poonatchi leads the hunger strike in Trichy 09:14 AM (IST) Fast officially commences. Around 1,500 cadres have arrived and more are trickling in. Women members are in large numbers. 08:57 AM (IST) Giant boards at the fast venue with pictures of OPS meditating at Jaya memorial 08:23 AM (IST) 
"While Panneerselvam, who was holding the chief minister's post, had said that an enquiry led by an independent judge will be appointed to probe the cause of her (Jayalalithaa's) death, it is not clear why the present government is hesitating to do so," E Madhusudhanan said. 08:22 AM (IST) 
"The silence maintained by the Tamil Nadu government on the issue has caused worry to the people of the state and to the true loyalists of Amma (J Jayalailthaa)," party presidium chairman E Madhusudhanan said. 08:22 AM (IST) 
Rebel AIADMK leader O Panneerselvam's faction is observing one-day fast today in all district capitals across Tamil Nadu, seeking an independent probe into the demise of former chief minister J Jayalalithaa. From around the web More from The Times of India Recommended By Colombia
